oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Facts Every Negro Should Know about Roosevelt
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African Americans; campaigns; Democratic Party; education; housing; government; politics; Roosevelt, Franklin D.;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Campaign material supporting Roosevelt's Democrats. Outlines improvements the Democrats have brought to the black community, via the Works Progress Administration, the National Youth Administration, housing changes, the Civilian Conservation Corps, farming loans, and the Defense Program.
